title: The Magic Gang and Sly & Robbie at Tuff Gong - Converse Rubber Tracks
description:
Legendary rhythm section Sly & Robbie are the heart and soul behind the sound of countless classic reggae albums. When Brighton’s The Magic Gang traveled to Jamaica for a recording session at Tuff Gong Studio, they had the chance to shape their new tracks with guidance from the iconic duo.

See more stories from the Converse Rubber Tracks global studio takeover

Listen to a new track from The Magic Gang's sessions at Avast Recording Co. “Hellway to High:
